member.name: T:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes
member.summary: Contains a set of static nodes working on observables.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.Empty``1
member.summary: Returns an empty observable sequence

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.Never``1
member.summary: Returns a non-terminating observable sequence, which can be used to denote an infinite duration (e.g. when using reactive joins)

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.PubRefCount``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Returns an observable sequence that stays connected to the source as long as there is at least one subscription to the observable sequence and shares only one single subscription to the underlying sequence.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.OnErrorTerminate``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Terminates the sequence upon successful or exceptional termination

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.BackoffAndRetry``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Double)
member.summary: Repeats the source observable sequence until it successfully terminates. Each subsequent subscription will be delayed by the given amount of time in seconds

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.BackoffAndRetry``1(System.IObservable{``0},System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Repeats the source observable sequence the specified number of times or until it successfully terminates. Each subsequent subscription will be delayed by the given amount of time in seconds

member.name: T:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.BlockingReceiver`1
member.summary: Receives values from an input sequence. Each call to Receive blocks until the next value is produced.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.ObservableNodes.BlockingReceiver`1.Receive(System.IObservable{`0},`0,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Blocks until the next item is produced by the input sequence and returns the value. Since the call is blocking make sure to use it on a different thread than the producer and provide it with a proper cancellation token. Without a token the method will return immediately with the default value.
member.param: The sequence to receive values from.
The value to return in case the receive call fails.
The cancellation token to cancel the blocking receive call.
Whether or not a value was received.

member.name: T:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler
member.summary: Provides wrapped versions of all the standard schedulers of RX with VL exception handling.

member.name: P:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.CurrentSynchronizationContext
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work as soon as possible on the current thread.

member.name: F:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.Default
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work on the platform's default scheduler.

member.name: P:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.CurrentThread
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work as soon as possible on the current thread.

member.name: F:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.Immediate
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work immediately on the current thread.

member.name: F:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.NewThread
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work on a new thread using default thread creation options.

member.name: F:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.TaskPool
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work on Task Parallel Library (TPL) task pool using the default TaskScheduler.

member.name: F:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.ThreadPool
member.summary: Gets a scheduler that schedules work on the thread pool.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.Reactive.SafeScheduler.CatchAndReportRuntimeExceptions(System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: Returns a scheduler that wraps the original scheduler, adding VL exception handling for scheduled actions.
